text: Diggah Nabiyow nanu wacyi kol oobisneh, Nabii Nuucuuy kaak lakal tan Ambiyal wacyi kah oobisne innah, Nabii Ibraahim kee Nabii Ismaaqiliiy Nabii Iscaaqh kee Nabii Yaq-qhuubuuy kay Samadak Ambiya yekke maral wacyi oobisneh, Nabii Qiisaay Nabii Ayyuub kee Nabii Yuunusuuy Nabii Haaruun kee Nabii Suleymaanal wacyi oobisneh, Nabii Daawuuduh Zabuur deqsita kitab necee
